name: Zakariya's Prescription for Maruf
desc: The words on this prescription resemble nothing so much as a serpentine dance. You can barely make out the phrases...

textualResearch.title: If the patient has a headache

desc.text: The words on this prescription resemble nothing so much as a serpentine dance. You can barely make out the phrases "Mint," "high flame," and "the herbs float."

textualResearch.title: If the patient has a stomachache

desc.text: The words on this prescription resemble nothing so much as a serpentine dance. You can barely make out the phrases "Henna Berry," "low flame," and "the herbs wilt."

textualResearch.title: If the patient can't see well

desc.text: The words on this prescription resemble nothing so much as a serpentine dance. You can barely make out the phrases "Starshroom," "turn the high flame down low,”and "the herbal soup deepens in color.”

value.text: Commission Good Medicine Is Hard to Come By
